title: Digital Art Museum
address: Odaiba Palette Town 2F, 1-3-8 Aomi, Koto-ku, Tokyo, Japan

title: Tsukiji Fish Market
address: 4 Chome-13 Tsukiji, Chuo City, Tokyo 104-0045, Japan
description: YUMMY YUMM get fresh sushi and tamagoyaki too

title: Ciel's Head Spa
address: 2-13-5 Minamiikebukuro, Toshima-ku, Tokyo, Ishikawa Building 2nd floor
description: Get yo' scalp cleaned here. I haven't been to this particular location but have had similar service done while getting my hair done. Although this place specializes in Head only
english: Doesn't look like it. Have your hotel concierge try helping you book!

title: Hayato Salon Roppongi
address: 〒106-0032 Tokyo, Minato City, Roppongi, 3 Chome−7−1 Tokyo Plaza 206
description: This was my go-to spot to get my hair done when I was living in Tokyo. You can add on a short head spa of hair treatment in addition to getting your hair cut. The Japanese hair salon experience is quite unique if your up for it.

title: Tsukiji Cooking
address: Japan, 〒104-0045 Tokyo, Chuo City, Tsukiji, 6 Chome−22−3 ウィンド築地 Ⅱ ビル 6 階
description: I haven't done a cooking class in Tokyo just yet, but it's been on the bucket list/ If you go, let me know!

title: Watch a Sumo Tournament
address: Ryogoku Kokugikan Arena, 1 Chome-3-28 Yokoami, Sumida City, Tokyo, 130-0015
description: If you're traveling in January, May, or September you may be able to catch a Sumo Tournament! See here for booking tickets in English: sumo.pia.jp/en/

title: Shopping in Ginza
description: Filled with Department stores and stand-alone stores. Get your picture at Tokyo Plaza's Kaleidescope Staircase then enjoy shopping!
